transcript:
Agent: Customer service, how can I help you?

Customer: Hi, I need to update my shipping address on my account.

Agent: I can help with that. For security purposes, can you verify your email address?

Customer: It's sarah.jones@email.com

Agent: Perfect, thank you Sarah. What's the new address you'd like to add?

Customer: It's 742 Maple Street, Austin, Texas, 78701.

Agent: Got it. 742 Maple Street, Austin, TX 78701. I've updated your shipping address. Would you like to make this your default address?

Customer: Yes please.

Agent: Done. Your new address is now set as the default. Is there anything else?

Customer: Nope, that's all. Thanks!
golden_summary: Customer requested shipping address update. Agent verified identity via email (sarah.jones@email.com) and updated address to 742 Maple Street, Austin, TX 78701. New address set as default shipping address per customer request.

key_points: New address: 742 Maple Street, Austin, TX 78701
